statement.tex: An insurance company insured $2000$ scooter drivers, $4000$ car drivers and $6000$ truck drivers. The probability of an accident involving a scooter, a car and a truck are $0.01, 0.03$ and $0.15$ respectively. One of the insured persons meets with an accident. What is the probability that he is a scooter driver?
